title: Microlearning Program for Nursing Students: Patient Safety and Quality Improvement Competency-Based Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A 5-day modular education program conducted in a mobile learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), designed with a blended structure combining real-time interaction and asynchronous learning activities

learning_goals: Ability to apply standard guidelines (5 items) for preventing patient safety incidents with 80% or higher accuracy
Analyze and implement three strategies for reducing medical errors in real clinical scenarios
Develop nursing process improvement plans using quality improvement tools (PDCA cycle, FMEA, etc.)
Demonstrate over 90% comprehension of items in the Hospital Survey on Patient Safety Culture (HSOPSC)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
